com.salesforce.omakase.writer

Class StyleAppendable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.omakase.writer.StyleAppendable

  • public final class StyleAppendable
extends Object
    A wrapper around an Appendable that provides a few convenience functions.

    When not specifying a particular Appendable then use toString() to get the final output.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StyleAppendable()
      Creates a new StyleAppendable using a StringBuilder.
      StyleAppendable(Appendable appendable)
      Creates a new StyleAppendable using the given Appendable.

      • indent

        public StyleAppendable indent()
        Increases the indentation level. Indentation spaces are appended when newline() or newlineIf(boolean) are called.
        Returns:
        this, for chaining.

      • indentIf

        public StyleAppendable indentIf(boolean condition)
        Increases the indentation level only if the given condition is true. Indentation spaces are appended when newline() or newlineIf(boolean) are called.
        Parameters:
        condition - Only increase the indentation level if this condition is true.
        Returns:
        this, for chaining.
